story_02_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey, nice battling back there.
Thanks to you guys, we were able to
chase off those goons in no time.
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
No sweat! [Name:PlayerNickname ] and I
came here for that exact reason anyway!
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I feel way better now that we took care of
those Team Break guys.
Guess it’s time to focus on the PML!
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0400_10: Hang on—this is your team for the PML?
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep, that’s right!
Are you thinking about competing, too?
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Hey! Why don’t you join our team, Paulo?
You seem pretty cool. I bet you’d be an
awesome teammate!
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
No, thanks... I think I’ll pass.
I’m actually thinking of putting together
my own team to enter the tournament.
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Aww, come on!
Well...I guess if you have your own plans,
we can’t really force you.
story_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If you’re looking for more teammates,
you might want to try the volcano area.
story_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I hear it’s a popular spot for doing training
exercises with your Pokémon...
story_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Seriously?! Dude, thanks for the info!
Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m fining you if you’re late!
